text: Liberty Ross The woman who seemingly lost the most, is also the one who may have gained the most. After divorcing her husband, the model went on to marry super producer Jimmy Iovine, the co - creator of Interscope Records and the now chairman of Interscope Geffen A & M. In a 2013 Vanity Fair profile, the Brit said of the time, ` ` It was really the worst, really the worst.'' She continued, ` ` I have no words to describe what we went through. But I think, for me, something always has to completely die for there to be a rebirth. And, for me, I feel like I'm going through a rebirth.''
